author: Jason Brown
content:
Visiting Manchester for the evening on my own, I asked someone where I could find a decent curry. I was directed to Mo, the owner of this and that and I was not disappointed. Mo was incredibly welcoming, friendly and his food is delicious, by his own admission, it's a no frills place but there is a reason it has been here for 40 years! The restaurant support the local homeless community on a Thursday evening too.
Absolutely worth a visit, you won't be disappointed.
